sense.def:
Z izrazom
relative
povemo, da naš opis nečesa velja, če opisano stvar primerjamo z drugimi stvarmi.

seg.quote: The head of the department is a relative newcomer.
He chose to return to the relative peace of his childhood village.
A relatively small number of people disagreed.

sense.def:
Izraz
relative
uporabimo, ko primerjamo velikost ali naravo dveh stvari.

seg.quote: There was a discussion on the relative naval strengths of the two countries.

sense.def:
Relative to something
pomeni v primerjavi s tistim;

seg.quote: There is a shortage of labour relative to the demand for it.

sense.def:
One's relatives
so člani posameznikove družine.
